definition: pitfall/trap/to get stuck/to sink/to cave in/to frame (false charge)/to capture (a city in battle)/to fall (to the enemy)/defect
pitfall/trap (archaic)
to sink into/to get caught up in/to land in (a predicament)
defect/flaw/physical defect
pitfall/snare/trap
to subside/to sink/to cave in
to be deeply in (trouble, debt etc)/deep set (eyes)
caught in (a bad situation)/to fall into (trap etc)
to cave in/hollow/sunken/depressed
to entrap/to set up/to frame (up)/to make false charges against
to fall into enemy hands/to be occupied/to degenerate/to submerge
subsidence/caving in/fig. stranded/lost (in contemplation, daydreams etc)
to charge and break through enemy lines
to subside/subsidence
to entrap/to frame/to plant false evidence against sb
to overcome/to take (a fortress)/to fall (to an attack)/to surrender
to surrender (of a fortress)/to fall (to the enemy)/subsidence (of land)

sentences.english: Pies and tarts often contain berries as do many other pastries.
sentences.chinese: 派和餡餅常以漿果爲陷，而許多糕餅類亦然。

sentences.english: The swamp country is inclined to poach in winter.
sentences.chinese: 這片沼澤地帶在冬季一踏就陷下去。

sentences.english: The ground suddenly sank under his feet.
sentences.chinese: 他腳下的土地突然陷下去了。

sentences.english: The natural gas enrichment of Jurassic depression in the west of Sichuan is mainly controlled by lithofacies.
sentences.chinese: 川西坳陷侏羅系天然氣富集主要受巖相控制。

sentences.english: Daxing fault in Jizhong sag is characterized with segmentation and variations for each segment.
sentences.chinese: 冀中坳陷大興斷裂具有分段性，且各段特徵存在差異。

sentences.english: An old fox is not easily snared.
JK tells us " Regulus got in a little too deep."
sentences.chinese: JK說“雷古勒斯陷的有點太深了。

sentences.english: The exploration and research levels of Middle Paleozoic marine strata are low in West Pingle Depression.
sentences.chinese: 萍樂坳陷西部中古生界海相區塊勘探與研究程度較低。

sentences.english: Lime-soil cushion is a common method to deal with collapsible loess.
sentences.chinese: 灰土墊層是處理溼陷性黃土的一種常用方法。

sentences.english: The Southwest Tarim Basin belongs to Southwest Depression in regional structure.
sentences.chinese: 塔里木盆地西南地區，在區域構造上屬西南坳陷。

sentences.english: Dongying sag is a dustpan shape one with very abundant oil and gas.
sentences.chinese: 東營凹陷是一個含油氣十分豐富的箕狀斷陷凹陷。

sentences.english: Lokting awake after crying in some words to frame Aileen Jun.
sentences.chinese: 樂婷清醒後哭着對家駿說些陷誣陷艾琳的話。

sentences.english: The reservoir diagenesis of Bazhou Depression, Minhe Basin was intense.
sentences.chinese: 民和盆地巴州坳陷儲集層的成岩作用強烈。

sentences.english: This paper presents a method for assessment of loess collapsibility using the data mining technology. Coefficients of collapsibility are predicted using the method.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用數據挖掘中的預測技術進行黃土溼陷性評價。

sentences.english: The Xinglongtai area is located in the Western Sag of Liaohe Depression.
sentences.chinese: 興隆臺地區位於遼河坳陷西部凹陷。

sentences.english: Shangdu depression has the mono-faulted structural characteristics, that is west-faulting east-overlapping.
sentences.chinese: 商都坳陷具有單斷式的結構特徵，即西斷東超。
